thread.title: Anushka Sharma's 'Phillauri' song 'Whats Up': The first wedding track of this season is out!
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma's 'Phillauri' song 'Whats Up': The first wedding track of this season is out! - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Anushka Sharma's 'Phillauri' song 'Whats Up': The first wedding track of this season is out!
text:
Anushka Sharma in a still from 'Whats Up' song from 'Phillauri'. Pics/YouTube 
New song titled 'Whats Up' from Anushka Sharma's upcoming film 'Phillauri' is out! Have you heard this season's first wedding track yet? 
Watch 'Whats Up' video: 

The song has been crooned by Singer Mika Singh and Jasleen Royal.

Anushka Sharma in a still from 'Whats Up' song from 'Phillauri' 
'Phillauri' is Anushka Sharma's second home production, first being 'NH10'. Shot extensively in the picturesque and colourful state of Punjab, the film also Suraj Sharma and Mehreen Pirzada.
The shoot had begun on Baisakhi earlier 2016 in a start-to-finish schedule that wrapped up by June end.
'Phillauri' will release on March 24.

Anushka Sharma and Suraj Sharma in a still from 'Whats Up' song from 'Phillauri' 
In case you've missed the trailer, watch it here !
